alert.note: Alert for Duplin; Inland Onslow; Jones; Lenoir; Northern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 2:14PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jones, south central Lenoir, northwestern Craven, northern Onslow and southern Duplin Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 214 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Albert J Ellis Airport, or 12 miles west of Half Moon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Wallace, Pumpkin Center, Half Moon, Phillips Crossroads, Rose Hill, Richlands, Beulaville, Catherine Lake, Kellum, Cypress Creek, Comfort, Chinquapin, Potters Hill, Petersburg, Pleasant Hill, Albert J Ellis Airport, Richlands South, Sarecta and Deppe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Duplin; Inland Onslow; Jones; Lenoir; Northern Craven
